EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Devoxx BE_Q416.Post-event 12-5-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Devoxx Belgium 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at Devoxx BE. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to learn more about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io]]>, a great public cloud for running Spring (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry! Don’t forget to get your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud Native Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook]]>, a useful primer for IT management on why cloud-native matters.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Developing Reactive applications with Reactive Streams and Java 8 <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/DYM-1744/Developing_Reactive_applications_with_Reactive_Streams_and_Java_8]]> by Brian Clozel & Sébastien Deleuze - It's a kind of magic: under the covers of Spring Boot <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/IJX-7017/It%27s_a_kind_of_magic:_under_the_covers_of_Spring_Boot]]> by Stéphane Nicoll & Andy Wilkinson - Reactive Web Applications <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/RZQ-2819/Reactive_Web_Applications_with_Spring_5]]> by Rossen Stoyanchev - Advanced Spring Data REST <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/EFQ-9530/Advanced_Spring_Data_REST]]> by Oliver Gierke - Cloud-Native Java <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/WZG-2836/Cloud_Native_Java]]> by Josh Long - Cloud-Native Streaming and Event Driven Microservices <[[http://cfp.devoxx.be/2016/talk/HQK-8232/Cloud_Native_Streaming_and_Event-Driven_Microservices]]> by Marius Bogoevici
Hungry for the latest in Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry?
- Spring Blog: Notes on Reactive Programming Part I: The Reactive Landscape <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/06/07/notes-on-reactive-programming-part-i-the-reactive-landscape]]> - Spring Blog: Reactive Programming with Spring 5.0 M1 <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/07/28/reactive-programming-with-spring-5-0-m1]]> - Spring Blog: New in Spring Framework 5.0: Functional Web Framework <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/22/new-in-spring-5-functional-web-framework]]> - Spring Blog: Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.0 GA release <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/07/12/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-0-ga-released]]> - Pivotal POV blog: Now Available—Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/now-available-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=InfoQ-sponsored-post-newsltr&utm_medium=sponsored-update&utm_campaign=infoq-spring-cloud-services-blog]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: Cloud-Native Java <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-cloud-native-java]]> with Josh Long - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: The journey from monolith to microservices: a guided adventure <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tx5h3hdvjfw]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: 12 Factor, or Cloud-Native Apps: What EXACTLY Does that Mean for Spring Developers? <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-12-factor-or-cloud-native-apps-what-exactly-does-that-mean-for-spring-developers]]>
Stay in touch with our team and join the Spring conversation with the Spring community on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal and Spring Team
